post_title: [Pre-Match Discussion Thread] Inter vs Como (Serie A, Matchday 17)

comments.author: TheWBird
comments.body: Score some goals early then sub out our starters and play slow

comments.author: blasphemics
comments.body: Every match has to be a win, unfortunately. Atalanta won't stop, the triplechins.

comments.author: ProvidenceXz
comments.body: Let Paz score 1 but lose and Lautaro go pat on his back after match.

comments.author: pazzopazzini77
comments.body: Will be exciting to see Nico Paz against our team. Expecting a win to keep up with Napoli & Atalantaâ€™s wins

comments.author: Successful_Boat960
comments.body: Dont let that Como bus leave the city with Nico Paz onboard after the game

comments.author: tiempo86
comments.body: Boring! Let's rotate the squad, and sub in 5 starters in the 60th when 0 - 0. 90th minute winner incoming!

comments.author: subundu
comments.body:
Lol yeah, why not? Tucu at min 89, then disallowed goal\\missed penalty for Como at 90+6. After that, straight to my doctor for some nerve painkillers.

edit

Oh and don't forget a few endless var checks.
